verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G1453>Stand<s%> <S%G1519>forth<s%> <S%G3319><s%>. Stand forth: Gr. Arise, stand forth in the midst

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to do <S%G15>good<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> to do <S%G2554>evil<s%>? to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%>? <S%G1161>But<s%> they held their <S%G4623>peace<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had looked round <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3709>anger<s%>, being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G444>man<s%>, Stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he stretched it <S%G1614>out<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%>. hardness: or, blindness

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G4160>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2401>Idumaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%>, when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> what great <S%G3745>things<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> a small <S%G4142>ship<s%> should wait <S%G4342>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> they should <S%G2346>throng<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>; insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they pressed <S%G1968>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>plagues<s%>. pressed: or, rushed

<S%G2532>And<s%> he goeth <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calleth<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G565>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4160>ordained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2007>surnamed<s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G993>Boanerges<s%>, which <S%G3603>is<s%>, The <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3844>friends<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they went <S%G1831>out<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> He is beside <S%G1839>himself<s%>. friends: or, kinsmen

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> He <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G954>Beelzebub<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils<s%> casteth he <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3850>parables<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>?

No <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3756>can<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a strong <S%G2478>man's<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>, and <S%G1283>spoil<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4632>goods<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> he <S%G1210>will<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1210>bind<s%> the strong <S%G2478>man<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>spoil<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G265>sins<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> unto the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> <S%G3745>wherewith<s%> <S%G302>soever<s%> they shall <S%G987>blaspheme<s%>:
